entry.title: BILLY REMEMBERED: SIR ALEX FERGUSON

Billy is on record as saying I ‘made use of my flailing elbows to great effect’. You could say I played [...]

entry.title: BILLY REMEMBERED: DENIS LAW
entry.summary: HOW good was Big Billy? He was a top man, on and off the park. A real gentleman and very good company. My Manchester United colleagues Bobby Charlton, Nobby Stiles [...]

entry.title: BILLY REMEMBERED: SANDRO MAZZOLA

He told us of the Celtic captain and his ability in the [...]

entry.title: BILLY REMEMBERED: FRANK McAVENNIE

entry.title: BILLY REMEMBERED: PAT BONNER
entry.summary: BILLY McNEILL was deadly serious. ‘Get your act together or you’re on the next boat home,’ he told me. I was 19 years old, a boy among men, really. I could have folded. Let’s face it, those were extremely hurtful words from the Celtic manager. If Billy was trying to provoke a reaction from a [...]

entry.title: BILLY REMEMBERED: JIM CRAIG

entry.title: BILLY REMEMBERED: BOBBY LENNOX
